name: VENICE IN ALL ITS BEAUTY
description: This trip will show us all the beauty of Venice out from the tipical touristic route, we'll go in hundreds and hidden secrets streets but full of entertainment that Venice has to offer to you. We'll start our trip from piazzale Roma, first and last stop for every bus, tram, airport shuttle and cars in Venice, and we'll finish it around Arsenale,  where we are surrounded  by a spectacular sunset on Venice.
